participant_1.background: i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.background: i enjoy being around people. i like to workout a a times a week. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i am a professional wrestler.

content.text: that s awesome   i studied chemistry   yet work in a bookstore
